column4: Hi. I bought this sandisk CRUZER 4gb... and i want to format it using gparted because i don't want all this extra "U3 software" garbage that's preloaded on it.... How come GPARTED won't let me format it??
How do I format this Sandisk 4GB Cruzer flash key?
Jack_Sparrow... gparted is what i thought... but there's a "locked" icon next to the device, and I cannot format it. gparted won't let me
